name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.memoryRedisChat
semantic_context: Stores the chat history in Redis.

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice

sessionKey.name: sessionKey
sessionKey.description: The key to use to store session ID in the memory
sessionKey.ai_hint: The key to use to store session ID in the memory

sessionIdType.name: sessionIdType

options.name: Connected Chat Trigger Node
options.description: Looks for an input field called 'sessionId' that is coming from a directly connected Chat Trigger

options.name: Define below
options.description: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

sessionIdType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

sessionTTL.name: sessionTTL
sessionTTL.description: For how long the session should be stored in seconds. If set to 0 it will not expire.
sessionTTL.ai_hint: For how long the session should be stored in seconds. If set to 0 it will not expire.

contextWindowLength.name: contextWindowLength
contextWindowLength.hint: How many past interactions the model receives as context

conditional_rules: IF sessionIdType == 'fromInput' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 1.4}} THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionKey'
